text: Climats, terroirs of Burgundy are a series of properties that exemplify the viticulture practices of the Burgundy wine region, including climats, a political regulatory impetus, and terroirs, an agricultural system sympathetic to local geography, geology and climate. It includes: * Vineyards and associated production units including the town of Beaune and nearby villages * The historic centre of Dijon == References == Category:World Heritage Sites in France
title: Climats, terroirs of Burgundy
